SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.smtp.security

Class SecureMxRecord

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.smtp.security.SecureMxRecord
public class SecureMxRecord extends Object
MX record with associated security policy.

Combines an MX DNS record with the security policy (DANE/MTA-STS/Opportunistic)
that applies to connections to that MX host.

See Also:
